extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1550 gamer points.. All 75 Achievements included. This includes the Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn DLC Achievements. Descriptions for all 75 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Bethesda.

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: This app really has helped me get more achievements that\'s the idea wasn\'t it.
reviews.author: Benjamin Northrup

reviews.title: Completely pointless
reviews.comment: Nothing in this app is anything I couldn\'t read in my 360 dashboard. No hints on where certain quests are located or where certain items can be found.
reviews.author: Zak Borden

reviews.title: UMADBRO
reviews.comment: love the idea but you could make it so that it has the amount of G you\'ve earned next to the achievable at the bottom
reviews.author: A Google User
